QuestData.Title: Lost in Retreat
QuestData.Description: Is this the end?$b$bOur beloved Malfurion. I saw him in the Dreamer's clutches, but Ysera was... changed. Twisted.$b$bShaladrassil, our mighty world tree, is corrupted beyond recognition.$b$bWe were forced to flee our home without our belongings. Some were heirlooms, sacred to us. Return them to me if you can, $c, I beg you.
QuestData.RewardText: It is not much, but it is better than I could have hoped for. You have our gratitude.
